masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone rigged the Secret Santa! All the 'random' draws are pairing people with their ENEMIES. Jake got assigned to buy for the guy who bullies him. Sarah got the girl who spread rumors about her. It's designed to cause maximum drama. Can you figure out who did this?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Investigate who tampered with Secret Santa
  • Fix the pairings before people get hurt
  • This seems pettyâ€”but is there a deeper motive?
